data.name: PaperOne
data.descript: PaperOne is a painting application which is imitating the real paintbrush!
data.descript-zh: PaperOne是一款模擬真實畫筆的繪畫應用，瞬間把手機和平板變成你的手繪本！

data.name: PhotoText
data.descript: PhotoText is an image-text production application which is concise and fantastic !
data.descript-zh: Phototext是一款簡潔流暢的圖文製作應用
